name: IPG
description:
Version 0.8.1 (Early access)

This is an extremely new game and I'm fairly new to the programming scene myself so do expect bugs from time to time. Do please report the bugs as well.

Settings aren't implemented yet.

Player 1 controls; WASD - movement, space - shoot/select.

Player 2 controls; Arrow keys - movement, right ctrl - shoot, enter - select.

Player3 controls; (Gamepad) Main buttons - movement (a, b, y, x), right trigger - shoot/select.

Player4 controls; (num pad) 8456 - movement, 7 - shoot.

Leave match; esc and start button (gamepad).

You are invisible circles trying to kill each other.

Everyone moves once every second (at the same time as the square blinks). Last one alive or the one that has the most colored tiles when the time is up wins.
